attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man is nothing less than a dictator who, if left in power will have a catastrophic impact on this country and its future.the UK is no longer a democratic state, it is a nanny state at best which in time will resemble the USSR of old where it citizens no longer have a voice. we need to get this stalin style dictator out now before its too late!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
